entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
